column2: Stunning Views of LA from East LA
column3: I took a short hike on a Sunday afternoon. Free parking. The weather was lovely. Stunning Views. A truly beautiful place.
I went here with my to kill time with my kids while my wife had to be in the area on this work trip. Great park, kind of a hidden gem!
What a treat of a park. Great for locals to get out and get some quality recreation. PLEASE show this place some love and enjoy this great place!
This is a great local park. It has all the amenities you need in a park. I won't name drop but I ran into people you would know. They're just like us!
